briefTitle: 12 Week Efficacy and Safety Study of Empagliflozin (BI 10773) in Hypertensive Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

1. Patients \>=18 years with type 2 diabetes
2. HbA1c of \>= 7.0% (53 mmol/mol) and =\< 10% (86 mmol/mol)
3. Mean seated systolic blood pressure 130-159 mmHg and diastolic blood pressure 80-99 mmHg

Exclusion criteria:

1. Uncontrolled hyperglycaemia with a glucose level \>240 mg/dl (\>13.3 mmol/L) after an overnight fast before randomization
2. Known or suspected secondary hypertension
3. Acute coronary syndrome (non-STEMI, STEMI and unstable angina pectoris), stroke or transient ischemic attack within 3 months prior to informed consent

outcomeMeasures.title: HbA1c Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in HbA1c after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean 24-hour Systolic Blood Pressure Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline of mean 24-hour systolic blood pressure (SBP).

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean 24-hour Diastolic Blood Pressure Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in mean 24-hour diastolic blood pressure (DBP) after 12 weeks.

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Patients With HbA1c <7%
outcomeMeasures.description: Proportion of patients with HbA1c \<7% after 12 weeks.

outcomeMeasures.title: Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in FPG after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Weight Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in body weight after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Daytime Mean Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in daytime mean SBP after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Daytime Mean Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in daytime mean DBP after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Nighttime Mean Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in nighttime mean SBP after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Nighttime Mean Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in nighttime mean DBP after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough Mean Seated Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in Trough Mean Seated SBP after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Trough Mean Seated Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in trough mean seated DBP after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Patients Reaching Blood Pressure <130/80 mmHg
outcomeMeasures.description: Proportion of patients reaching blood pressure \<130/80 mmHg after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Composite Endpoint of Change From Baseline of HbA1c, Systolic Blood Pressure and Body Weight
outcomeMeasures.description: A composite endpoint of the following conditions at week 12 compared to baseline (all 3 fulfilled): reduction of HbA1c from baseline of at least 0.5%, reduction of systolic blood pressure \> 3 mmHg from baseline and reduction of weight from baseline \> 2%

outcomeMeasures.title: Orthostatic Blood Pressure
outcomeMeasures.description: Orthostatic blood pressure (BP) at baseline and after 12 weeks of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Confirmed Hypoglycaemic Adverse Events
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with confirmed hypoglycaemic adverse events
